column5: I need a new ice fishing minnow bucket. My old cooler and cheap aerator finally bit the farm on Sunday. So itâ€™s time to go shopping!!!! Anybody use something exceptional or is there something I should stay away from. I just want this for winter only. Thanks in advance...
stay away from a regualr bucket, mine froze over completely on saturday ice fishing, lol
I like an Igloo brand 5 gallon water keg, the baitfish don't get trapped in a corner and die.
Frabill makes good ice fishing buckets that you can soup up with rod holders, padded seats, etc. They are insulated and keep bait nice & fresh all day in both winter and summer.
